ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Hmmmm, trouble really brewing?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe they got jealous of Asheron s Call... (ya know the OTHER MMORPG) about 6 months ago... Turbine cratered several cities. Totally and completely nuked
ygData.messageBody:
I believe they got jealous of Asheron's Call... (ya know the OTHER MMORPG)
about 6 months ago... Turbine cratered several cities. Totally and
completely nuked them as part of the story line. Funny stuff like turning
the resident cow into a cow corpse .... complete with a swarm of flies and
such.

VI does some odd things... I wouldn't put it past them. I mean.... they
STILL don't provide anything remotely like customer service and we STILL pay
them every month. Maybe they're going to push the envelope and see what
they can get away with.

I for one resent them blocking off the Barbarians. Who am I going to stare
at? <sheesh>

Aethyra D'Lusionall
Enchantress of the 40th circle
Grandmistress Jeweler
Rodcet Nife, Mystic Alliance
(Rich)
-----Original Message-----
From: Maidenofiron@... [mailto:Maidenofiron@...]
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 8:09 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hmmmm, trouble really brewing?!?!

<snip>

I also doubt that they would trash starting sitties
<snip>

Have a great day!
~Lori : Ivymayden, Vyxen, X~Melalle
